articles.description: Will Apple keep the familiar iPhone notch? What about the Lightning port? Here are the rumors we've heard.
articles.content:
We don't yet know how the iPhone 13 Pro Max (or whatever it ends up being called) will compare to the iPhone 12 Pro Max, pictured here.
Andrew Hoyle/CNET
